name: ProgressiveRunning
title: Progressive Running
author: BinbinHfr
description: Accelerate progressively when starting running : useful when your max speed is high due to exoskeletons and concrete, and you want to position precisely your character.
description_original: Accelerate progressively when starting running : useful when your max speed is high due to exoskeletons and concrete, and you want to position precisely your character.
